Item.Subject: Version 2.9 Released
Item.Memo:
All versions:
- Minor bugs fixed
Pro version:
- Contacts bug fixed

Item.Subject: Readme
Item.Memo:
HOW-TO (Help Hotkey: F1)
CREATE EVENT (Hotkey: Ctrl+E): - double-click on the white space of the Events window, or - select the "New..." item on the Events Window context menu.
CREATE NOTE (Hotkey: Ctrl+N): - just double-click on the empty space in the Notes window. To edit an existent note, double-click on it.
CREATE CATEGORY (Hotkey: Ctrl+S): - right-click on the empty space in the Notes window and then select the New Category item on the context menu. To create a nested category, right click on the parent category and then select the New Category item on the context menu.
